ORDINANCE, 1962
WEST PAKISTAN ORDINANCE NO. XXII OF 1962
[25th May, 1962]
AN
to provide for the recovery of Government dues as arrears of land revenue in the Province of West
Pakistan.
Preamble. WHEREAS, it is expedient to provide for the recovery of Government dues as
arrears of land revenue in the Province of West Pakistan in the manner hereinafter appearing;
NOW, THEREFORE, in pursuance of the Presidential Proclamation of the seventh day of
October, 1958, and in exercise of all powers enabling him in that behalf, the Governor of West Pakistan
is pleased to make and promulgate the following Ordinance:__

provisions.title: Section 2. In this Ordinance, unless the context otherwise requires, the following expressions shall
provisions.content:
have the meanings hereby respectively assigned to them, that is to say__
(a)        “defaulter” means a person from whom any dues are recoverable by
Government, and includes a person who is responsible as surety for the payment
of any such dues; and
(b) “Government” means the Government of the Province of West Pakistan.

provisions.title: Section 3. (1) Government may, by notification, declare that any dues or class of dues recoverable by
provisions.content:
Government shall be recoverable from the defaulters as if such dues were arrears of land revenue.
(2) On the publication of a notification under sub-section (1) any such dues shall be
recoverable under the Revenue Recoveries Act, 1890 (Act I of 1890) as arrears of land revenue.

provisions.title: Section 4. Government may make rules for the purpose of giving effect to the provisions of this
provisions.content:
Ordinance.
